special_text:
[i]“I don't know how long we floated there... but eventually the fog cleared...”
–Statement of Carlita Sloane[/i]
I – Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains ward {1}.
II – You may exile a creature you control. If you do, each opponent discards a card.
III – Draw a card for each opponent who controls more creatures than you.
